Homemade Guacamole

Serves 6

Ingredients

  • 3 large avocados
  • 1 tsp. Cholula Sauce
  • 1 lime
  • 2 oz. Grape Tomatoes, quartered
  • Salt and Pepper, to taste

Directions

  1. Halve avocados and remove pits, setting them aside. Cut avocaods into cubes with a pairing knife, then scoop into a bowl.
  2. Halve avocados and remove pits, setting them aside. Cut avocaods into cubes with a pairing knife, then scoop into a bowl.
  3. Halve avocados and remove pits, setting them aside. Cut avocaods into cubes with a pairing knife, then scoop into a bowl.
  4. Halve avocados and remove pits, setting them aside. Cut avocaods into cubes with a pairing knife, then scoop into a bowl.
  5. Halve avocados and remove pits, setting them aside. Cut avocaods into cubes with a pairing knife, then scoop into a bowl.
